title: Nature's Gift
summaries: Nature's Gift is an accessory that reduces the mana cost of using magic weapons and other mana-consuming items by 6%. It is acquired by harvesting a rare flower that grows on Jungle grass in the Underground Jungle, using any weapon or tool. The flower appears as a blue version of the Jungle Rose.

statistics.Sell: 54
